thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 2 of 193
thread.title: Izzy Abbass

author: Izzy Abbass
title: Izzy Abbass
text:
Art was extremely helpful and more importantly, very friendly with me this morning. I honestly was a little cranky as I had called before he called me as I was on hold for quite awhile before being pushed into the auto survey system - had not yet spoken with a CSR. Art was understanding, apologetic and above all professional.
Seems like he could be a good trainer for other CSRs.
Izzy
